mapper.select: SELECT id,name,teacher,service_teacher,service_teacher_tel, begin_teach_time,classroom,max_amount,current_amount,credit FROM course WHERE current_timestamp BETWEEN begin_select_time AND end_select_time AND id NOT IN ( SELECT course_id FROM sc_info WHERE (opt_type='XK' OR opt_type='PD') AND student_id=#{studentId} )

SELECT c.id,c.name,c.teacher,c.service_teacher,c.service_teacher_tel, c.begin_teach_time,c.classroom,c.max_amount,c.current_amount,c.credit,si.opt_type si_opt_type FROM course c JOIN sc_info si ON (c.id=si.course_id) JOIN student ca ON (ca.id=si.student_id) WHERE current_timestamp<date_add(c.end_select_time, interval -1 day) AND si.student_id=#{studentId} AND c.id IN ( SELECT course_id FROM sc_info WHERE (opt_type='XK' OR opt_type='PD') AND student_id=#{studentId} )
SELECT student_id FROM sc_info WHERE course_id=#{courseId} AND opt_type='PD' ORDER BY opt_time limit 1

SELECT sum(cs.credit) FROM student c JOIN sc_info si ON (c.id=si.student_id) JOIN course cs ON (cs.id=si.course_id) WHERE c.id=#{studentId} AND current_timestamp>cs.end_teach_time AND cs.begin_teach_time BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} AND si.attendance='CQ' AND si.opt_type='XK'

SELECT sum(cs.credit) FROM student c JOIN sc_info si ON (c.id=si.student_id) JOIN course cs ON (cs.id=si.course_id) WHERE c.id=#{studentId} AND current_timestamp<cs.end_teach_time AND si.attendance='CQ' AND (si.opt_type='XK' OR si.opt_type='PD');
